adjective.description: Having a color or colors, especially as opposed to being black, white, or neutral.
examples: brightly colored birds are easier to see

adjective.description: Wholly or partly of nonwhite descent.
Used as an ethnic label for people of mixed ethnic origin, including African slave, Malay, Chinese, and white.

noun.description: A person who is wholly or partly of nonwhite descent.
A person of mixed ethnic origin speaking Afrikaans or English as their mother tongue.
Clothes, sheets, etc. that are any color but white.
